pros: You really learn a lot, you get to meet so many different people, and are able to actually help someone or ease his situation through your work. I learned so much there and I am truly grateful.
cons: There is no possibility for becoming an employee at the UN Agencies after the end of your internship. You are EVEN restricted from applying for ANY UN position for 6 months after the end of your internship which is insane. All of the aforementioned should also be considered in the light that you receive no salary, grant or whatever subsidy.
